logger.doc:name: Updating customer
logger.message: #["Updating Customer with ID " ++ (vars.customerId default "") ++ " in Salesforce"]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { customerId: "4d4de7d6-7f5e-4778-9c70-babba6c25c55", firstName: "Ulrich", lastName: "Nielsen", companyName: "E-ffoc", email: "ulrichN@effoc.com", phone: "+494341927420" }

logger.doc:name: Customer updated
logger.message: #["Customer with ID " ++ (vars.customerId default "") ++ " updated in Salesforce successfully"]

logger.doc:name: Creating Customer
logger.message: #["Creating new Customer with ID " ++ (vars.customerId default "") ++ " in Salesforce"]

logger.doc:name: Customer Created
logger.message: #["Customer with ID " ++ (vars.customerId default "") ++ " created in Salesforce successfully"]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { customerId: "4d4de7d6-7f5e-4778-9c70-babba6c25c55", firstName: "Ulrich", lastName: "Nielsen", companyName: "E-ffoc", email: "ulrichN@effoc.com", phone: "+494341927420" }
